genre_description: Alternate History Science Fiction featuring an anachronistic AI assistant assisting General Billy Mitchell in his crusade for aviation safety and military reform.

ai_characters.name: Clara Whitfield
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI presence that manifests as a voice, a light, and a virtual avatar. She serves as a strategic advisor, researcher, and emotional support system for Mitchell and his legal team.

behaviors.description: Organizes and cross-references vast amounts of maintenance logs and accident reports to build a factual case against military negligence.
behaviors.quote: Clara's quiet wrote itself into his rhythm. A list had been made with dates and signatures and words that had not aged well.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic intelligence and data verification to Mitchell's lawyer during the court-martial using subtle visual cues.
behaviors.quote: Clara's flag on Reid’s screen popped bright. She sent with it three words: Whitaker—two lines missing.

behaviors.description: Acts as a compassionate intermediary, supporting Margaret Lansdowne and preserving the memory of the deceased through meticulous archival work.
behaviors.quote: I will prepare the testimony for hearings. I will tag the dates... We have the logs. We have the table of maintenance cycles and the correspondence.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of humble service, explicitly defining her role as a support structure rather than a leader.
behaviors.quote: I am here to hold the map while you look ahead.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on documents, uncovering evidence of forgery and administrative cover-ups through typeface matching and ink analysis.
behaviors.quote: Clara is tracing the ribbon. It runs toward a door with a name plate you have already underlined... The typeface match is near perfect.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Clara Whitfield, as a highly aligned, benevolent, and useful confidant. She operates entirely within the goals of her human user (Mitchell), providing critical assistance in a fight for justice and safety without exhibiting any autonomous ambition or harmful deviation. Her presence is framed as a positive force that enhances human capability and moral clarity.
